text: vah log kahane lage ki (ai moosa) tumhaare aane ke qabl (pahale) hee se aur tumhaare aane ke baad bhee ham ko to baraabar takaleeph hee pahunch rahee hai (aakhir kahaan tak sabr karen) moosa ne kaha anakareeb hee tumhaara paravaradigaar tumhaare dushman ko halaaq karega aur tumhen (usaka jaanasheen) banaega phir dekhega ki tum kaisa kaam karate ho
